title: have not recived my ocean week rewards no responce to my support ticket ...
body: despite earning 13 points qualifying for the icon an mystery champ rewards during ocean week  still have not received them on my account nor a response to my ticket asking for this to be looked at what gives riot ???

replies.body:
Hey there,

Player Support can sometimes take a while to respond to tickets, rest assured they _will_ respond to you in due time.
Please avoid creating new tickets and/or replying to your currently open ticket as this can push you back to the end of the queue.

However I don't believe anyone was missed while the rewards were being handed out, are you sure you were enrolled in Ocean Week?
